Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hi, where do I go to verify my business?

Hi Constance, you can verify your business by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. Please include the following details in your email:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. For more information, you can check out our guidelines here: [Advertising Help Center](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/26538006900877-Advertising-Help-Center).
You're welcome, Constance! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
